page.title: 05A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: My name is Linda Bisset,here is my life style. I lead quite an interesting life, because I am quite busy. On Sundays I go to Sunday School while on Wednesday evenings I take piano lessons. On Thursday mornings I go with the other pupils in my class to swimming lessons in the Trainer Pool at Banchory Academy which is our local Secondary School. On Thursday evenings I go to Athletics Club which I enjoy very much because we do interesting things like high jump, long jump and lots of running. I also help my father who is farmer at Tersets Farm, Drumoak. In winter I help to feed the cows, take in straw for them to sleep on and feed the hens and ducks. In summer I help him to stack up hay then take it to the barn.
